description:
This course is designed to teach students how to use the Google App, Google Slides, to create sophisticated presentations. Geared towards users with strong basic computer skills, the videos in this course will cover:

  • Creating a presentation
  • Choosing a theme
  • Inserting and formatting text
  • Inserting and formatting images
  • Inserting and formatting shapes
  • Adding speaker notes
  • Adding new slides
  • Importing slides
  • Arranging slides
  • Changing themes and backgrounds
  • Sharing a presentation
  • Collaborating with other users
  • Using comments
  • Finalizing and giving a presentation

This is a 30 minute quick start to this application.
title: Introduction to Google Slides
